title: account hijack
extract: Cloud account hijacking is a process in which an individual or organization's cloud account is stolen or hijacked by an attacker. Cloud account hijacking is a common tactic in identity theft schemes in which the attacker uses the stolen account information to conduct malicious or unauthorized activity.Sep 11, 2018
